sentence.Network_en: Take your ease, for the journey ahead will be long and arduous.
sentence.Network_cn: 好好休息一下, 前面的路程远而艰难呢.

sentence.Network_en: The refugees made an arduous journey through the mountains.
sentence.Network_cn: 难民们艰难地越过高山.

list.abs: this year macro-control this year for the real estate industry is an extremely arduous task , and the continuing rise is a real control of the largest problems .这预示了今年对房地产业的宏观调控是一项异常艰巨的任务，而房价的持续飙升更是成为调控的最大难点。

arduous是什么意思|arduous的中文意思... ... arduous facile ： 费劲的 arduous work ： 艰苦的工作 arduous efforts ： 艰辛努力.
训练的英文翻译，训练用英语怎么说... ... 业务训练 a business train 艰苦训练 arduous training 进行训练 to carry on training.
the impressions , with which I first undertook the arduous trust , were explained on the proper occasion .最初负起这个艰巨职责时的感想，我已经在更适当的场合说过了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin arduus 'steep, difficult' + -ous

entry.def: Something that is arduous is difficult and tiring, and involves a lot of effort.

example.tran: 一段漫长、炎热而又艰苦的旅程

example.ex: The task was more arduous than he had calculated.
example.tran: 这项任务比他所估计的要艰巨得多。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by toilsome effort to the point of exhaustion; especially physical effort;

sentences.sentence: "worked their arduous way up the mining valley"
"spent many laborious hours on the project"

means.word_mean: 2. taxing to the utmost; testing powers of endurance;

sentences.sentence: "your willingness after these six arduous days to remain here"- F.D.Roosevelt

means.word_mean: 3. difficult to accomplish; demanding considerable mental effort and skill;

sentences.sentence: "the arduous work of preparing a dictionary"
